p: This virus belongs to the family of viruses called Coronaviridae. There are four genera of coronaviruses (É‘,ğ›ƒ,É£,ğ³), COVID-19 belongs to the beta-coronaviruses as its genome matches 88% and 50% to the other coronaviruses which are SARS and MERS, respectively [ 4]. It is believed that initially, the virus transmitted from animals to humans, and among humans, the virus transmitted via respiratory droplets [ 3, 5].
